author: Shaun Lintern, Shaun Lintern
title: Coronavirus: Thousands of virus deaths may be being under-reported, warn experts
description: As new data emerges community deaths, experts have warned thousands may not have been reported as Covid-19 cases
content:
The number of deaths as a result of the coronavirus outbreak could be even higher than official statistics suggest because of under-reporting by doctors, experts have warned.
Concerns have been raised that patients may be dying of other causes as a result of… [+3627 chars]
